artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Mitaya Kihachi
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 243, horizontal ōban #76.05
description: men and women wearing blue and red, some with black and white umbrellas, in a courtyard; figures in a two-story building at left; roof in LRC
inscription: ULC in the print, in black: untranslated inscriptions; on back, in pencil: [STAR060]
markings: LRC, stamped in red: untranslated stamp; on back, on sticker: [Made in Japan / (untranslated)]
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Pictures of Famous Places in Osaka (Naniwa meisho zue 浪花名所図会)
title: Kuken-chō in the Shinmachi Pleasure Quarter
